Room 5332

	Shipping and receiving

		Storage cabinets

		Shelf

		Desk


	Receiving Area and DB Transfer Entry

		Storage cabinet

		Desks

		Shelf

		Trash

		Computer
			For updating databases when shipments are sent or received

		Gowning area
			Room for entry and exit of clean room

			Gowning storage
				Contains hair nets, shoe covers, gloves, and face masks
				Cubbies for personal storage

			Lab coat rack
				Add to layout?


Room 5324



	Module Parts Storage and Module Plating

		Sensor cabinet
			36" x 24" (0.91 x 0.61 meters) (0.56 m^2)
			Cabinet for storing sensors

		Base plate cabinet
			36" x 24" (0.91 x 0.61 meters) (0.56 m^2)
			Cabinet for storing base plates

		Tested PCB cabinet
			36" x 24" (0.91 x 0.61 meters) (0.56 m^2)
			Cabinet for storing PCBs that have already been tested

		Assembly tool cabinet
			36" x 24" (0.91 x 0.61 meters) (0.56 m^2)
			Cabinet for storing assembly tools

		Shipping prep and general purpose workbench
			30" x 72" (0.76 x 1.83 meters) (1.39 m^2)
			Workbench for preparing and packing finished modules
			Lower shelf space for shipping boxes and carrier plates

		Granite Table
			24.5" x 36.5" (0.62 x 0.92 meters) (0.58 m^2)
			
			Height gauge


		Tool chest
			18" x 29.5" (0.46 x 0.75 meters) (0.34 m^2)



	Module Fabrication

		Gantry Prep Desk (Carrier plates on lower shelf)
			30.25" x 72" (0.77 x 1.83 meters) (1.4 m^2)

			Computer
				For updating module and part databases

		Module parts for weekly build plan; dry run parts (Cabinet)
			36" x 24" (0.91 x 0.61 meters) (0.56 m^2)
			Stocked weekly with sensors, base plates, and PCBs
			Contains dummy parts for dry runs
			Notes
				Has some tubing in the back. Does there need to be accessible space behind this cabinet?

		Glue table
			60" x 24" (1.5 x 0.61 meters) (0.93 m^2)

			Shelves
				For syringes, glue, gluing supplies

		Gantry system
			48" x 48" (1.22 x 1.22 meters) (1.49 m^2)
			Weight (total 825 kg)
				Lower aluminum slab: 2.5” x 46” x 48” (240 kg)
				Upper aluminum slab: 2” x 48” x 48” (200 kg)
				Stand (hollow tubes, steel, assumed wall thickness 3/8”) (150 kg)
				Gantry (from product specifications) (180 kg)
				Tooling and plates (40 kg)
				Vacuum system (guess) (15 kg)

			Aerotech Gantry AGS10000 0.75 x 0.75 meter
					Rotational stage and mount to ATS100 - ADRS-100
					Z axis stage ATS100
					Other labs should consider a 1m x 1m gantry

			Camera

			Fixture for glue syringe

			Vaccum supply and distribution system on lower shelf


		Gantry rack
			36" x 24" (0.91 x 0.61 meters) (0.56 m^2)

			Gantry computer
				A3200 Software and Labview software

			Monitor, mouse, keyboard
			Gantry Joystick
			UPS
			Power supply and interface for vacuum system
			Aerotech A3200 Npaq Drive Rack Gantry Controller
			EFD Ultimus V High Precision Dispenser (for glueing)
			Gantry E-stop switch
			Vacuum gauge


		Module Curing Cabinet
			36" x 24" (0.91 x 0.61 meters) (0.56 m^2)
			Cabinet for storing carrier plates under vacuum for curing.
			Vacuum supply manifold on wall next to cabinet.
			Vacuum line feedthroughs into cabinet for curing.


		Printer



	Module Wirebonding

		Granite table with stereoscope
			36" x 24" (0.91 x 0.61 meters) (0.56 m^2)

			Stereoscope
				Cuda 1-150 fiber optic illuminator
				Leica StereoZoom 4 stereoscope

			Granite table

		Pull Tester and Microscope Computer desk
			60" x 30" (1.5 x 0.76 meters) (1.2 m^2)

			Pull Tester
				13" x 22" (0.33 x 0.56 meters) (0.19 m^2)
				Weight (total 21 kg)
				Royce 610 Bond Tester

			Microscope computer

		Microscope station
			34" x 30.5" (0.86 x 0.77 meters) (0.67 m^2)

			Microscope
				X-Y table
				Nikon Stereoscope
				Moticam 5 Digital Microscope Camera
				Mitutoyo Digital Readout


		Shelf

		Hesse Bondjet BJ820 Wirebonder
			52.5" x 52.5" (1.3 x 1.3 meters) (1.7 m^2)
			Weight (total 1350 kg)

			Notes
				The footprint seems large. Does it include the wirebonder table?

		Wirebonder table
			42" x 29" (1.1 x 0.7 meters) (0.79 m^2)
			Table that serves as workspace for preparing modules for wire bonding
			Shelf space for bonder tooling under table


		Modules to be bonded and to be repaired (Cabinet)
			36" x 24" (0.91 x 0.61 meters) (0.56 m^2)
			Cabinet for module storage. Needs module storage racks.
			Stores modules that need to be wire bonded, and modules that have been pulled and need repair.


		OGP
			40" x 53" (1.0 x 1.4 meters) (1.37 m^2)
			Weight (1050 kg)
				https://www.machmarket.com/sale/other/other/ogp/avant-zip-600/as13561
				(only source I could find.)
			Avant 600 Zip Optical Gaging Table
			Made by Optical Gaging Products Inc.
			Note: model obsolete. Other labs should acquire newer version.


		OGP Table
		65" x 39" (1.6 x 1.0 meters) (1.63 m^2)
			Weight (total 50kg) (includes desk, computer, and controller)

			OGP Computer

			OGP Controller

			Notes
				The desk could be much smaller than it is





Room 5318


	Module Testing

		Cold box desk
			48" x 30" (1.22 x 0.91 meters) (0.93 m^2)

			Computer
				For controlling colr box and updating test database

		Cold box rack
			32" x 36" (0.81 x 0.91 meters) (0.74 m^2)

		Cold box control rack
			21" x 22" (0.53 x 0.56 meters) (0.30 m^2)
			Houses cold box power supply and controller

		Modules for testing (cabinet)
			36" x 18" (0.91 x 0.46 meters) (0.42 m^2)
			Cabinet for storing modules to be tested

		Testing Desks (1, 2, 3)
			60" x 30" (1.5 x 0.76 meters) (1.2 m^2)

			Clamshells

			Shelves

		Loval Server and Backup rack
			Rack containing local server and backup computers

		Problem Modules (cabinet)
			36" x 24" (0.91 x 0.61 meters) (0.56 m^2)
			Cabinet for storing problematic modules

		Encapsulation curing cabinet
			36" x 24" (0.91 x 0.61 meters) (0.56 m^2)
			Cabinet for curing modules that have been encapsulated

		Encapsulation desk
			94" x 36" (2.39 x 0.91 meters) (2.18 m^2)

			Encapsulation gantry
				What model do we have?
				Other labs would likely get a newer model.

			Notes
				The desk can be much smaller than this, as we're using it for the cold box, but this space will be used by other groups for encapsulation.

		Rack
			22.25" x 22.25" (0.56 x 0.56 meters) (0.32 m^2)

			Notes
				We use this for the cold box setup, but it isn't necessary for encapsulation.
				Should we remove it from the floorplan?

		Untested PCBs (Cabinet)
			36" x 24" (0.91 x 0.61 meters) (0.56 m^2)
			Cabinet for storing new PCBs that haven't been tested


External equipment

	Air drier

	Chiller
